description:
Opportunities to purchase in this highly desired Burleigh location are rare and even rarer when they are of a standard like this! Occupying an unrivalled position on the highly coveted Burleigh Hill, you will find 28 Hill Ave Burleigh.

The elevated position allows north-facing coastline and ocean views that are unlike any other. Designed over two stunning levels, this new freestanding hillside home is impressive in its design and features breathtaking sweeping views of Burleigh and beyond.

The home is light filled with refined interior features to create a feeling of space and serenity. No detail has been overlooked with soft whites, complemented by the warm natural tones of the blackbutt timber floors and floor-to-ceiling window treatments in sheer natural fabrics.

On the first floor, you will find a primary suite with a walk-in robe and ensuite and two large bedrooms with built-in robes, pendant lights, ducted air conditioning, and ceiling fans.

The stunning bathrooms feature terrazzo tiles, Reece tapware in brushed nickel and brass, and frameless glass while you can soak away your troubles in the second bathroom in the ultimate freestanding bath.

On the second floor, you instantly experience a feeling of space and light with the sweeping coastal views. The designer kitchen features a stunning island wrapped in blue-black timber battens, topped with 50mm stone replicated in the back benches, splashbacks and waterfall sides. Brand new Bosch and Asko appliances have been carefully selected as practical yet stylish additions.

The living area flows onto the alfresco deck that overlooks a landscaped tropical oasis and the inground pool on the ground level. Low-maintenance gardens surround the pool with iconic elements such as the coastal breeze blocks, which frame the area and are complemented by modern lines and warm wood tones. An outdoor shower is well positioned to wash away the sand before taking a plunge after a day at the beach.

28 Hill Avenue represents the best in Burleigh living with excellent cafes and restaurants such as Rick Shores, The Tropic and Burleigh Pavilion right on your doorstep.

Enjoy the laid-back lifestyle Burleigh heads has to offer! This property represents exceptional buying for anyone looking to invest in an exclusive high-growth area. But, unfortunately, this opportunity won't last. Contact Brad Payne today to arrange an inspection.

Features:
